billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

title: Relates to the sale of certain tickets to theatres or places of amusement or entertainment
summary: Prohibits the sale of tickets to theaters or places of amusement or entertainment where such tickets are available to the public at no charge; violations shall be punishable by $100 fine.
currentCommittee: CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
actClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of certain tickets of admission to theatres, or places of amusement or entertainment
